La calidad


```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
CALIDAD_DE_FRUTOS_28_06 <- read_excel("C:/Users/soffp/OneDrive/Escritorio/CALIDAD DE FRUTOS 28-06.xlsx", 
   col_types = c("text", "skip", "text", 
         "text", "text", "skip", "skip", "skip", 
         "skip", "skip", "skip", "skip", "skip", 
         "skip", "skip", "skip", "skip"))
```

```{r}
CALIDAD_DE_FRUTOS_28_06 <- CALIDAD_DE_FRUTOS_28_06 %>%
 rename(Repeticion = ...2,
        Peso = ...3,
        Firmeza= ...4)
  

ggplot(CALIDAD_DE_FRUTOS_28_06, aes(x= Repeticion, y= Firmeza)) + 
  geom_point(color= "blue")
```
